title: Workshop on Improving Collaborative Network-Based Language Education Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic language teaching methodologies and online education tool utilization experience
context.additional_context: A customized workshop for in-service practitioners to strengthen language education design capabilities, with a focus on developing collaborative learning design skills using visualization tools.

learning_goals: Learners enhance their competency in designing learner-centered language activities using a collaborative network approach.
Learners can identify three or more structural issues in existing curricula by applying visualization tools.
Learners can develop two or more creative language learning scenarios that deviate from the traditional "teach-practice-apply" model.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
